About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

I am computer programmer having in-depth knowledge about Computer Architecture, Compiler construction, Algorithms designing and Software Engineering principles. I worked in OOP paradigm i.e. designing system(software) architectures, class diagrams, object diagrams and ER Diagrams for many such systems i.e. POS, Blogging System, and work in Laravel PHP as well as in ASP.Net. I qualified in CS major having MS CS specialized in Software Engineering.

PHP Laravel Workshop at VU

MVC Programmer

I have participated in a workshop with Software industries practitioner / experts to polish my skills in OOP paradigm in PHP / Laravel framework, MVC pattern and design one complete project in guidance of experts. I really enjoyed the company of classmates and programming mentor in this workshop. I collaborated via GitHub with class mates and programming mentor on the assigned project.

Backend Developer at Kainaat Soft Tech ©

JavaScript, Node.js & Backend Programmer

I really shine in designing of logistic code / algorithmic modules that can be reusable and scalable. I have worked in designing software system at logic layer of three-layered architecture and design business logic in very impressive way that accommodate user changes in requirement as easy as possible. I really belief that designing generalized algorithms and then extending them to specialized algorithms are very easy and scalable that conform to open/close principle. I work in C# while developing using ASP.Net and use PHP while working in larvel Frame Work.

Computer Teacher

Programming Mentor / IT Trainer

I started my career from teaching that what I have learned in CS / about programming to teach others and expand my knowledge by teaching others and explored the concepts related to programming and computer science as general. I teach from secondary level to master level subjects of computer science especially C/C++, Database, and software engineering. I teach fundamentals of programming and different paradigm of programming to others. I motivated my students to explore more own their own to excel in their study and especially in computer programming.
